P01V247_2E.txt
For iXon TX247 Interline Frame Transfer CCD (10/5/3/1 MHz with Datel 1410).

IMPORTANT: Clock driver outputs are paired for extra drive current, therefore paired 
outputs (e.g. S1 and S1A) MUST match or driver chips may be damaged.

PDT is Photo Diode Cell Transfer (a single pulse done just before frame transfer)


SIIBSSSS 	SSI-ISR- 	--H-A-D- 	HCPRR--M 	--F----F 	SSR-C-P-
212 PPPP     	111 22S  	  V M M  	VGT31  U 	  I    R 	CC2 G X
    3210     	 AA AAT  	  F P P  	R32N   X 	  R    A 	23  2 L
<VS-st>
11100000	00101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
11100000	00101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
01100000	00101010	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
01100000	11101010	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
01100000	11101010	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
11110000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
<\VS-st>

<VS-all>
10100000	00001110	00000000	10101001	00000000	00001000
10100000	00001110	00000000	10101001	00000000	00001000
00000000	00000010	00100000	00101001	00000000	00001000
00000000	00000010	00100000	00101001	00000000	00001000
01000000	11100010	00000000	10101001	00000000	00001000
01000000	11100010	00000000	10101001	00000000	00001000
11100000	11101110	00100000	00101001	00000000	00001000
11110000	11101110	00100000	00101001	00000000	00001000
<\VS-all>

<PDT>
11100101	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
11100101	11101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11100101	11101110	00000000	00001001	00000000	00001000
11110101	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	00001000
<\PDT>

<VH>

212 PPPP     	111 22S  	  V M M  	VGT31  U 	  I    R 	CC2 G X
    3210     	 AA AAT  	  F P P  	R32N   X 	  R    A 	23  2 L
<HS2E10>
11100000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	10001000

11100000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	10001000

11100000	11101100	00000000	00100001	00000000	00100000
11110000	11101100	00100000	00100001	00000000	00101010
<\HS-rd-clk2E10>

<HS-rd2E10>
11100000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	10001000
11100000	11101100	00000000	10101001	00000000	10000000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00100001	00000000	00100000
11110000	11101100	00100000	00100001	00000000	00101000
<\HS-rd2E10>

<HS-amp-rst2E10>
11100000	11101110	00000000	00101001	00000000	10001000
11100000	11101100	00001000	10101001	00000000	10000000
11100000	11101100	00000000	00100001	00000000	00100000
11110000	11101100	00100000	00100001	00000000	00101000
<\HS-amp-rst2E10>
